issue.message: Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.
The resource `R.layout.snackbar_like_toast` appears to be unused
Hardcoded string "Configure access from lock screen", should use `@string` resource
Hardcoded string "You can access LjotIt from lock screen by configuring one of the following options.", should use `@string` resource
issue.errorLine1: android:text="You can access LjotIt from lock screen by configuring one of the following options." />

issue.message: Hardcoded string "• Lock Screen Notification", should use `@string` resource
Hardcoded string "Enabled by default, configured in Settings.", should use `@string` resource
issue.errorLine1: android:text="Enabled by default, configured in Settings." />

issue.message: Hardcoded string "• Quick Settings", should use `@string` resource
Hardcoded string "You can add LjotIt to Quick Settings panel: Click panel edit button, and drag LjotIt to the active one.", should use `@string` resource
issue.errorLine1: android:text="You can add LjotIt to Quick Settings panel: Click panel edit button, and drag LjotIt to the active one." />

issue.message: Hardcoded string "• Lock Screen Shortcuts", should use `@string` resource

Hardcoded string "Some devices allow you to set applications on lock screen, typically in system lock screen settings. \nIt may be known as shortcuts (Samsung devices), Quick access (ASUS), etc.", should use `@string` resource
issue.errorLine1: android:text="Some devices allow you to set applications on lock screen, typically in system lock screen settings. \nIt may be known as shortcuts (Samsung devices), Quick access (ASUS), etc." />

issue.message: Hardcoded string "You are all set.", should use `@string` resource
